author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011599

The legendary arcade shooter returns on October 24, 2025, for PS4 and PS5!

THE HOUSE OF THE DEAD 2: Remake is a remake of the second entry in the well-known and popular rail-shooter series. Take on the lone role of a secret agent as James or Gary, or team up in co-op mode to neutralize the dangerous creatures standing in your way.

Story:
In February 2000, a small city was suddenly overrun by hostile creatures. Two AMS agents, James Taylor and Gary Stewart, were sent to investigate. Upon arrival, they noticed that the situation resembled the Curien Mansion incident from 1998. Determined to uncover the source of the infestation, they began shooting their way through hordes of creatures.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #thehouseofthedead 

Rated Mature
title: The House of the Dead 2: Remake - Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
A broke young man takes on the night shift at a roadside diner. In the glow of the blood moon, routine tasks turn into a fight for survival. First-person horror based on a dark creepypasta with a set of rescue rules.

#ps5 #ps5games #creepyshift
title: Creepy Shift: Roadside Diner - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10016634

An otherworldly, story-driven shooter with aggressive gunfights and terrifying monsters awaits you. This is the story of a girl who, by the will of fate, faced the beast - and in order to become free, she was forced to study its nature. How far can you go in the fight for your freedom? 

Coming October 28th to PS4 and PS5.

Rated Mature

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games
title: Silly Polly Beast - Release Date Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
